name: Springans Merrymaker
text:
2 Level 4 monsters
If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can send 1 "Springans" monster from your Deck to the GY. During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card (until the End Phase), then, if this card had 2 or more materials, you can send 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY that lists "Fallen of Albaz" as material. You can only use each effect of "Springans Merrymaker" once per turn.
